bioconda.name: bioconductor-kegggraph
bioconda.summary: KEGGgraph: A graph approach to KEGG PATHWAY in R and Bioconductor

biotools.summary: Interface between a KEGG pathway and a graph object, as well as a collection of tools to analyze, dissect and visualize these graphs. It parses the regularly updated KGML (KEGG XML) files into graph models maintaining all essential pathway attributes. The package offers other functionalities including parsing, graph operation, visualization, etc.

bioschemas.name: KEGGgraph
